content.raw:
Some ideas for GUI tests:

1. Simulation

    1. Check that the visuals are updated after a `~/model/modify` message is published.

    1. Check that the left panel is updated after a `~/model/modify` message is published.

1. Editor

    1. Check that values in the link inspector are updated when the user resizes the inertia in the 3D view.

    1. Check that inertia visualization (not yet present in the editor) updates correctly when the inertia is changed in the link inspector.
content.html:
Some ideas for GUI tests:

  1. Simulation

    1. Check that the visuals are updated after a ~/model/modify message is published.

    2. Check that the left panel is updated after a ~/model/modify message is published.

  2. Editor

    1. Check that values in the link inspector are updated when the user resizes the inertia in the 3D view.

    2. Check that inertia visualization (not yet present in the editor) updates correctly when the inertia is changed in the link inspector.
